Hi Stella, 

Sure, confirming we have now updated the below as well.

Thanks Heath.

Change: please make all of these product images be even - not 3UC longer and 3UU shorter etc. Even if you just zoom in to the image to show some of it, but make sure all boxes are even size wise.


Change: please make these boxes above on the products page be the same order/sequence as in the brochure. Make tabletops last.

Change: on some products you've updated, in the tab how to specify us, each line has a tick beside it. Others have ticks beside just 2 lines. It should look the same as what the https://duracube.com.au/product/lockers/ lockers page does at the moment.

I think that's it for now :) Thanks

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228 Mobile: 0428 685 691


Confidentiality Notice & Disclaimer: This email and any attachments are strictly confidential and remain the property of Duracube.

Hi Stella, 

Confirming we have updated this first batch of products as well as the product titles in the main menu. 

Please let us know if these require any further changes?

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body: @manuel I will brief you on this maybe today, but more than likely tomorrow. I will need to source the content for you.

Hi Stella, 

Ok noted, I'll keep you updated.

@heath base on the instruction I need your help to clarify the details.

Please spend 3 hours only updating the below, in this order.
Everything associated with the:
1. Lockers product page
2. Add unisex core product page as per new specs
3. Unisex ultra/full height product page as per new specs
3. Floor mount overhead brace (POB) product page to the new specs
4. Floor mount ceiling fixed (Fcf) product page to the new specs.

Thanks.
Manuel M

Hello again Heath,

Further to our conversation this afternoon, and your email advising of the 2 hours being used up, could you please proceed as below? Thanks.

Please spend 3 hours only updating the below, in this order.
Everything associated with the:
1. Lockers product page
2. Add unisex core product page as per new specs
3. Unisex ultra/full height product page as per new specs
3. Floor mount overhead brace (POB) product page to the new specs
4. Floor mount ceiling fixed (Fcf) product page to the new specs.

If you still have time within the 3 hours after that, let me know please. Feel free to call me if you have any questions.

Will do the remainder next month most likely.

Thanks.

Regards,
Stella Simpson
Duracube

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body: @manuel I have asked the client and will let you know. It's only the products section outstanding now. I'll let you know once I hear back. Thanks.

@heath what do you think with this? we will proceed to finish the task at least 2hrs again?

Let me know.
Thanks
Manuel M

Thanks Heath, please proceed with the 2 hours of work. How much would we be charged per hour thereafter if you don't get through them all in 2 hours? (if we didn't wait til next months website update that is).

Regards,
Stella Simpson
Duracube

@heath here is the remaining task. also I confused specially the images to used.

Manuel M

@heath may I ask if we have a full image for this pict? https://duracube.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/how-to-install-a-toilet-partition-bg.jpg

base on instruction:
Slide 5 – can we make the background image for the last slide be a full spread image, not just the smaller video image off to the right? Make it look the same full-scale image as the 1st and 2nd slides.

Thanks
Manuel M

Hi Stella, 

Ok sure, there looks like a fair bit of changes (I had a quick review). We will get through as many of the requests using your 2 hours for this month and then report back on how many are outstanding. You can then choose to have them completed in this month and by invoiced for the overage, or we can hold them back until next month.

@jaime can you please work with @manuel on this task? There are both design and developer related tasks.

Let me know if you guys need a hand with any of it.

Note: This client only has 2 hours on their account, so once you two get to 2 hours, please stop and give me a progress update.

Cheers

Hello Heath,

As discussed earlier today, could we please get these attached website changes actioned asap? Any questions, please let me know anytime.

I trust all of the attached makes sense. Thanks.

Regards,
Stella Simpson
Marketing Coordinator
